channel.title: Stable/Great all around server?
channel.description:
I haven't been on here in forever so I guess you could say I am a noob. I owned a couple decently popular servers back in the early days (nothing crazy)..
I just want a really stable, good server that I can mess around by myself on. Idk if I want a 317 or 508. I really don't know the difference too much. I was mainly on moparscape a LONG time ago so I don't know how things have changed.
I don't want something modded to the point that it is super retarded and I would like if there was some of the original runescape world in tact.
What is a great server that I can just download and play offline that has good stable combat, skilling, items like ags/claws/ancients. I want the game atleast up to 2007 date. Other than that I am not too picky I just don't want something that crashes if you spawn an NpC.
Know of any? Recommendations? Thank you..
